A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely ruined Star Wars.  My 4 year old commented how it's not the same without Luke Skywalker or Chewy.  This movie was a major step backwards serving the fan base\, both old and new. Killing Han Solo was hard.  Losing the entire point of the Skywalker lineage is a breaking point that can't be salvaged.  My children don't want SW toys because they don't connect to the new barrage of characters.  Completely undeveloped and rushed writing\, much like the DC universe.
